price: 16. Ntango Nkolo naye abengaki ye na ngomba esantu?
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
